6.Write a program for OnClick or OnSubmit

Back

Here is the following code for html save the file as .html

OnClick Code

<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Onclick</title> <script> function form() { alert("you have clicked the ClickMe! button"); } </script> </head> <body> <form onclick="form()" action="post"> <p>Please click the Click me! Button</p> <input type="button" value="Click Me!"> </form> </body> </html>

Output for OnClick

Output

OnSubmit Code

<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Onclick</title> <script> function form() { alert("Your Name has been submitted Successfully"); } </script> </head> <body> <form onsubmit="form()" action="onsubmit.html"> <p>Please Enter your Name and click the SUBMIT Button</p> Name:<input type="text"> <input type="submit" value="Click Me!"> </form> </body> </html>

Output of OnSubmit

Output
